Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetGaming

Packages that use NetGaming 
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.controller  
it.polimi.ingsw.network

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.controller with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ServerController.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming buildMessage)
    This method is called when a client wants to perform a certain build, if the player cannot perform a build because the indicated one is forbidden or because it isn't its turn or it is the wrong phase, this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
    void ServerController.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming moveMessage)
    This function is called when a player can move and want to perform a certain move, if it can't move this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.network

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RemoteView.handleBuildRequest​(NetGaming req, boolean error)
    It receives a well formed request of build, well formed means that the cell is inside the map, it is needed to check if the build can be done and if all parameters are correct.
    void RemoteView.handleMoveRequest​(NetGaming req, boolean error)
    It receives a well formed request of a move, well formed means that the cell is inside the map, it is needed to check worker and if is possible to move there.
    private void ClientMessageListener.parseGamingInput​(NetGaming msg)
    This method parses the gaming messages.
    private void ServerClientListenerThread.parseGamingInput​(NetGaming gamingMsg)
    This function parses the input that arrives from the client in the gaming phase, in this phase a player can move, build or disconnect, if the message is well formed it is sent to the RemoteView handling method.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.ui

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GraphicInterface.retrieveGamingMsg​(NetGaming gamingMsg)
    When this method is called a message must be processed by the client, the message will be sent to a queue to wait to be read.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void MainCliController.retrieveGamingMsg​(NetGaming gamingMsg)
    It receives asynchronous or synchronous messages from the network component that there was an error on the message sent or the message about.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void MainGuiController.retrieveGamingMsg​(NetGaming gamingMsg)
    The message is sent to the current JavaFX scene to change it or handle changes.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.viewModel

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.viewModel with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GameState.setPossibleBuilds​(NetGaming gamingMessage)
    Sets GameState.possibleBuilds value.
    void GameState.setPossibleMoves​(NetGaming gamingMessage)
    Sets GameState.possibleMoves value.

  • Uses of NetGaming in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers with parameters of type NetGaming 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ObservableRemoteView.notifyBuild​(NetGaming netMap)
    This method notifies the ObserverController about the message sent by the user during building phase.
    void ObservableRemoteView.notifyMove​(NetGaming netMap)
    This method notifies the ObserverController about the message sent by the user during moving phase.
    void ObserverController.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming netMap)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because someone wants to build.
    void ObserverController.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming netMap)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because someone wants to move.
